movies.title: temper
movies.desc: temper is a powerful action–drama about daya, a corrupt and short-tempered police officer who works only for money. when a shocking crime exposes his moral emptiness, daya is forced to face his conscience.

movies.title: virupaksha

movies.title: masooda
movies.desc: masooda is a gripping psychological horror–thriller rooted in realism and dark emotions. the story follows a mother and daughter whose lives spiral into terror when the daughter becomes mysteriously disturbed.

movies.title: arundhathi
movies.desc: arundhati is a powerful socio-fantasy horror thriller that blends reincarnation, revenge, and divine strength. the story follows arundhati, a courageous woman who discovers her connection to a fierce ancestor and confronts an ancient evil that continues to terrorize generations

movies.title: kanchana
movies.desc: kanchana is a perfect blend of horror, comedy, and emotion. the story revolves around raghava, a man who is extremely afraid of ghosts and refuses to step outside his house.

movies.title: polimera
movies.desc: polimera is a dark folk-horror thriller set in a rural village where black magic, superstition, and fear silently control lives. when a series of disturbing incidents shakes the village, hidden secrets tied to ancient rituals begin to surface.
